chart.title: Life expectancy vs. health expenditure
chart.subtitle: The [period life expectancy](#dod:period-life-expectancy) at birth, in a given year. Health expenditure includes all financing schemes and covers all aspects of healthcare. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
chart.note: Health expenditure is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2015 prices.
chart.citation: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); OECD Health Expenditure and Financing Database (2024)

Population (historical).descriptionShort: Population by country, available from 10,000 BCE to 2023, based on data and estimates from different sources.
Population (historical).descriptionProcessing:
The population data is constructed by combining data from multiple sources:

- 10,000 BCE - 1799: Historical estimates by HYDE (v3.3).

- 1800 - 1949: Historical estimates by Gapminder (v7).

- 1950-2023: Population records by the UN World Population Prospects (2024 revision).
